Package de.hshn.mi.pdbg.basicservice

Class ServiceTestCase

java.lang.Object
de.hshn.mi.pdbg.basicservice.AbstractServiceTestCase
de.hshn.mi.pdbg.basicservice.ServiceTestCase
public class ServiceTestCase extends AbstractServiceTestCase
ServiceTestCase provides methods to test common features of a BasicDBService object.

  • Method Details

    • testService

      @Test public void testService()
      This test checks if the BasicDBService is available.

    • testStoreNull

      @Test public void testStoreNull()
      Tries to store a null value. The test is passed if the BasicDBService.store(PersistentObject) throws an AssertionError.

      Involved methods:

      • BasicDBService.store(PersistentObject)

    • testMaliciousPersistentObjectImpl

      @Test public void testMaliciousPersistentObjectImpl()
      This test checks if it is possible to store an MaliciousPersistentObjectImpl. To pass the test, the BasicDBService.store(PersistentObject) must throw a StoreException.

      Involved methods:

      • BasicDBService.store(PersistentObject)
